body_html:
Yes, the C++ (and other language) APIs lack many of the higher level Python conveniences right now.
(Side note: The gradient registry for all operations in C++ is not as comprehensive as Python, so there is work to be done there - for details see the link that @drpngx pointed to).

The TensorFlow team doesn't have the cycles to pursue this ourselves right now, but if you'd like to give it a shot we'd be happy to discuss any interfaces/design that you propose.

FYI @suharshs @skye @josh11b
